Articles.Content:
sorry for delays guys. been a crazy weekend

group of losers took out their frustrations on my car with a bat, after I took down an idiot causing havoc, chased him down and took him off the road.

...he just had to come back with his boyfriends later after ramming his car into mine.

is being arrested, and charges laid. good show..

you don't hit another guys Supra!

...all good I have another one to drive while its healing

supercharged v8 oh yeah!

anyway I will get he next upload done now..
Ok, I'll be waiting!

update includes:

additional booster separation motors, and tweaks

more fuel in external tank

more monoprop

ssme smoke fix

and some others I forget right now

- - - Updated - - -

anything else needed right now?

- - - Updated - - -

No, Im on mac. I have a virtual server but it lags very badly.

- - - Updated - - -

Wait, school has abode photoshop. I can convert there.

did you still want jpegs?

Yeah. I'll just use .jpg for files.

also is this mod on CKAN, makes life easier.

I have to find out how to ckan.

also it seems the oscillations are because thrust is not pointing towards tanks COM and always overcorrects.

tweaking now

ok so I notice the srb nosecones make nullreference exceptions...

this I will have to investigate

https://www.dropbox.com/s/i1t5jopv4yi2xsk/mod%20patch.zip?dl=0

patch containing updated files and craft file to overwrite your space_shuttle folder

requires latest version of mod.

will make proper update when parachute fixed

looking for feedback

- - - Updated - - -

oscillations still present and maybe bad with extra weight
Just checking in. Wanting to know how things are going while i am unable to access my laptop

https://www.dropbox.com/s/i1t5jopv4yi2xsk/mod%20patch.zip?dl=0

patch containing updated files and craft file to overwrite your space_shuttle folder

requires latest version of mod.

will make proper update when parachute fixed

looking for feedback

- - - Updated - - -

oscillations still present and maybe bad with extra weight

I have noticed this, the way the shuttle wants to push its nose down after SRB separation is very apparent. It requires constant attention to prevent a "launch anomaly". This issue could easily.be fixed by reducing the amount of fuel in the ET. On a side note, love the new SRB parts! Though the way the SRB spams me with a party of Nullref exceptions is a nuisance. I'm sure fixes are on they're way, all in due time! Hype for 1.0.5 is increasing with each day!

oscillations still present and maybe bad with extra weight

I've been busy, has there been a fix for the oscillations that I missed?

you should use this little video ^^

btw, im in love with this mod ^^

good job and thanks you

I've been busy, has there been a fix for the oscillations that I missed?

Mike has been taking a bit of a much needed break from the mod to deal with life stuff. He should be back,shortly to fix the problems.
Hi guys. Sorry for going AWOL. Much life issues. Will get back into it as things get better. Any major issues to fix or should I get back to where I left off?
Crawler and MLP has a slight balancing issue when I lift off, also realism overhaul version of the MLP overheats and explodes on the pad.

A way to start the fuel cell through EVA or even if there is no electrical charge would be nice. Otherwise all good. Looking forward to seeing the new updates again. Glad you're back Mike! Hope all is well.

Crawler and MLP has a slight balancing issue when I lift off, also realism overhaul version of the MLP overheats and explodes on the pad.

Will have a play in the days to come. Crawler needs finishing

- - - Updated - - -

A way to start the fuel cell through EVA or even if there is no electrical charge would be nice. Otherwise all good. Looking forward to seeing the new updates again. Glad you're back Mike! Hope all is well.

This is a good idea. So many times I forgot to start generator before time warp to a dead shuttle lol

This is a good idea. So many times I forgot to start generator before time warp to a dead shuttle lol

Its the worst when that happens lol
working on a satellite tonight. shuttle stuff to come soon

working on a satellite tonight. shuttle stuff to come soon

Oh! which Satellite...wait, nevermind, I remember...
Is it working with 1.0.5?

Is it working with 1.0.5?

Im actually not sure right now. I will run tests and updates this weekend.

If anyone can repport on issues I would be thankfull
when I get a chance to get away from WOWS, I will run a few basic tests of it
I prefer war thunder, will test capability as well.

Nice work ! Mike and sampa i send u an MP !

Edit: Aplication sent

Edited November 10, 2015 by CrazyESP

Nice work ! Mike and sampa i send u an MP !

we will review the application soon!
